parliamentary.service.title: Parliamentary Service
parliamentary.service.para: Elected to the Senate for Queensland 2013 (term began 1.7.2014) (Palmer United Part to 12.3.15; Independent from 12.3.15).

committee.service.title: Committee Service
committee.service.para: Senate Legislative and General Purpose Standing: Legal and Constitutional Affairs References Committee from 24.6.15 (Chair from 24.6.15).
Joint Select: Australia Fund Establishment from 28.10.14; Trade and Investment Growth from 30.10.14 to 27.11.14.
Senate Select: Certain Aspects of Queensland Government Administration related to Commonwealth Government Affairs from 2.10.14 (Chair from 27.10.14).

parliamentary.party.positions.title: Parliamentary Party Positions
parliamentary.party.positions.para: Leader of the Palmer United Party in the Senate from 1.7.14 to 12.3.15.

quals.work.pre.parliament.title: Qualifications and Occupation before entering Federal Parliament
quals.work.pre.parliament.para: Professional rugby league player: Canberra Raiders 1987-91; Brisbane Broncos 1992-97; Melborne Storm 1998-99; NSW State of Origin team 1989-99; Australian Kangaroos 1990-99.
Winner, NSW Rugby League Premiership 1989, 1990, 1992, 1993; played two rugby league Kangaroo Tours; 22 test matches and 22 State of Origin matches.
